title: Week Review: Quotation & Discursives
goal: Demonstrate mastery of quotation and discursives.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

All 8 vocabulary words:

support → ?     help → ?
avoid → ?       sick → ?
healthy → ?     married → ?
work → ?        wait → ?

(Answers: sarji, sidju, rivbi, bilma, kanro, speni, gunka, denpa)

Grammar Summary (3-4 min)

Quotation Types

Type Cmavo Use
Grammatical lu...li'u Valid Lojban
Single word zo One word
Non-grammatical lo'u...le'u Foreign/error
Referent la'e Symbol → thing
Symbol lu'e Thing → symbol

Discursives

Cmavo Meaning
ku'i however/but
ji'a also
po'o only
mu'a for example
ta'o by the way
to'u in other words

Week 24 Vocabulary

Lojban English Lojban English
sarji support sidju help
rivbi avoid bilma sick
kanro healthy speni married
gunka work denpa wait

Self-Test (5-6 min)

Part A: Vocabulary (8 points)

Translate:

  1. sarji →
  2. rivbi →
  3. kanro →
  4. gunka →

Translate to Lojban:

  1. help →
  2. sick →
  3. married →
  4. wait →
Answers
  1. support
  2. avoid
  3. healthy
  4. work
  5. sidju
  6. bilma
  7. speni
  8. denpa

Part B: Quotation (8 points)

Choose lu...li'u, zo, or lo'u...le'u:

  1. "I go" (Lojban sentence)
  2. "mlatu" (single Lojban word)
  3. "Bonjour" (French word)
  4. "Hello, world!" (English phrase)

Translate:

  1. Alice says "hello."
  2. The word "gerku" means dog.
  3. I write a symbol for Alice.
  4. I take what "book" refers to.
Answers
  1. lu mi klama li'u
  2. zo mlatu
  3. lo'u Bonjour le'u
  4. lo'u Hello, world! le'u
  5. la .alis. cusku lu coi li'u
  6. zo gerku cu smuni lo gerku
  7. mi ciska lu'e la .alis.
  8. mi lebna la'e zo cukta

Part C: Discursives (4 points)

Translate:

  1. I go. However, you stay.
  2. I also like dogs.
  3. I like fruit, for example apples.
  4. I'm tired, in other words, I want to sleep.
Answers
  1. mi klama .i ku'i do stali
  2. mi ji'a nelci lo gerku
  3. mi nelci lo fruit mu'a lo plise
  4. mi tatpi to'u mi djica lo nu sipna

Integration Challenge (1-2 min)

Report speech and add commentary:

Use at least:

  • One quotation (lu...li'u or zo)
  • Two discursives
  • Two vocabulary words

Example:

la .alis. cusku lu mi gunka li'u
.i ku'i ta'o ri bilma
.i mi ji'a gunka mu'a bu'u lo zdani
.i mi sidju la .alis. to'u mi sarji ri
.i mi po'o denpa

(Alice says "I work." However, by the way, she's sick. I also work, for example at home. I help Alice, in other words, I support her. Only I wait.)

Create your own and say it aloud.

Week 24 Complete Reference

Vocabulary (8):

Lojban English Lojban English
sarji support sidju help
rivbi avoid bilma sick
kanro healthy speni married
gunka work denpa wait

Grammar:

Cmavo Function
lu...li'u Grammatical quote
zo Single word quote
lo'u...le'u Non-grammatical quote
la'e Referent of
lu'e Symbol for
ku'i however
ji'a also
po'o only
mu'a for example
ta'o by the way
to'u in other words

Cumulative vocabulary: ~196 words

Summary

You completed Week 24 on quotation and discursives. You can now quote text, reference symbols, and add metalinguistic commentary to your speech.

Congratulations! You've completed the first 24 weeks of Lojban. You now have a solid foundation in grammar and approximately 200 vocabulary words.
